data.description: Anyone who worked in video back in the days of video tape recorders will instantly recognize the SMPTE color bars test pattern with the timecode window.  This watchface for the Pebble Time is designed to simulate the look of timecode with user bits as the date.  Bluetooth connection status can be monitored via the servo lock indicator on the timecode window.  Bluetooth disconnect causes the watch to vibrate.

latest_release.release_notes: Support added for original generation Pebble.  Added ability to turn off Bluetooth disconnect notifications.

data.description:
Simple Watchface of a Pokemon Battle. Displays the time, day of the week, day of the month, month, the percentage of battery (+ if charging), smiling and sad faces for when the watch is connected or disconneted through Bluetooth.

The HP bars fill to show the progression of the day (enemy), and the progression of the week (yours).

Vibrates on disconnect.

data.author: Qlemann

changelog.release_notes: This first public release of Species Alpha is a  multi-platform build for Pebble and Pebble Time.

data.description:
Complex systems can be based on very simple rules ...

Species Alpha is a life-like cellular automaton, which generates automata out of a random generated or predefined rule set. 

Every 5 seconds a new generation is calculated. A species is automatically killed when its diversity is too high or too low. This also can be done by tapping on your watch (z axis). You can add new cells by 'punching' ;)  (y axis). The diversity (0 - 25%) is displayed on the right. 

The rule set string is defined as : 
[1-2] size of neighborhood function [B] neighbors needed for birth [S] neighbors needed for survival [G] current generation

Predefined rule sets are:
"1B3S23", // Game of Life
"1B36S23", // HighLife
"1B35678S5678", //	Diamoeba
"1B2S", // Seeds
"1B36S125", // 2x2
"1B368S245", // Morley
"2B4S4",  // Long term evolution

For further explanation of the subject i would recommend this read:  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Life-like_cellular_automaton and the BBC documentary The Secret Life of Chaos (2010)

This hobby project is wip. I would like to add a config option in the future.

Have fun!

latest_release.release_notes: This first public release of Species Alpha is a  multi-platform build for Pebble and Pebble Time.

data.title: Species Alpha

data.description:
FAQ: Celsius/Fahrenheit is chosen depending on whether you watch is set to display 24h or 12h mode, respectively. There's currently no plan on decoupling these settings.

In times of sunshine or rain - Tick Tock Weather always has an informative and attractive watchface. Beautiful flat animations that tick once a second in accordance to your local weather.

* Fetches the weather from OpenWeatherMap every 20 minutes
* Caches weather data
* Different animation depending on rain amount
* Indicates with icon if there's to be rain during the next 9 hours
* Prominent battery indicator and disconnect warning

data.author: MreData

changelog.release_notes:
This watchface is not a just challenge, but an opportunity to think differently. Since Christiaan Huygens invented the modern clock in the 17th century, we have looked at time the same way. until now, we have seen a number and associated an event in which we should partake. why not think differently, think Lyfe. What this watchface allows is the opportunity release yourself from the stressful clutches of numbed time and give you a refreshing look at colored time. With 24 different colors to represent each hour and a flawless transitions, why not give Lyfe a chance and think different, think easy.

recommended system settings set 24-hour clock, however 12 will also work.

data.author: Timmins Technologies, LLC

changelog.release_notes: Proper timezone support for Pebble Time. (Shhh!)
Color support: Adjusted colors to ones that look awesome on the real thing.
Fixed broken color icon in Enlightened App - Just a version bump for the Resistance one.

App storage writes in the bluetooth comm module seem to affect stability. As a result, we check to see if the write needs to be made by checking the received offset versus the currently operating offset. This limits write activities and should avoid crashes.
New release increments version number so I can keep track of code release differences between RES/ENL faces.
Take the great Resistance Septicycle watchface, and turn it green. Felt awkward, but hope you guys enjoy it.

data.description:
The watchface displays (in color!): 
* The current septicycle 
* The current checkpoint out of 35 
* A countdown to the next checkpoint 
* The current time (24h format) 
* Bluetooth status 
* Watch Battery Level (and charge status) 
* Ingress Scoring Region you are currently in (AM01-KILO-02, for example) 
* The next 3 checkpoints 
* And most importantly, the Enlightened Eye! 

All times displayed are in the timezone of your handset. The application should work worldwide, though there will be issues calculating the region at the poles.

latest_release.release_notes: Proper timezone support for Pebble Time. (Shhh!)

data.title: Ingress Enlightened Cycle Time

data.description:
A simple and clear watchface built for the pebble time, but works on all. It animates on loading/startup, and has all basic info such as day/date/BT/Batt. 

The battery box middle left will change colour on pebble time as per the battery level - going from green to dark red then black. Supports 12/24hr. Will show weather or seconds. Also has the week number next to the date, which can be swapped with day num (of year).  The background can be black or white. A few new color themes have been added (March '16).

* Added option to display help after tapping the watch
Version 1.0

data.description:
A stylish minimalistic binary Watchface that displays the current time and date in BCD (binary coded decimal) or true binary format. The look is inspired by the BCD clock I have in my living room. Works on square and round Pebbles with color and monochrome displays.

The configuration page shows a live preview of the current settings.

How to read BCD format:
* Each column represents one digit
* Two columns each for hours, minutes and seconds
* The rows have the values 1, 2, 4, 8 (from bottom to top)
* Add the values of all "on" bits in a column to get the digit

Configurable options:
* All colors
* Different styles for the bits, with or without borders
* Display of seconds, also only in certain intervals
* Display of date
* Display in true binary format instead of BCD
* Display help after tapping the watch, with or without decoration
* Bluetooth connection loss/reconnection alert (icon or color switch)
* Low battery level alert
* Hourly vibration
* Reaction to timeline quick view window

How to read true binary format:
* The first row represents the hours, the second are minutes and the last row shows the seconds
* The columns have the values 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32 (from right to left)
* Add the values of all "on" bits in a row to get the number

Please contact me at pebble@timm.tc for bug reports, questions or feature requests.

Please remember to "heart" the Watchface if you like it. Thanks!

latest_release.release_notes: no vibrations during quiet time

data.title: BCD minimalist (binary watch)

I've added some new options to customize the readout.  In addition to the original layout (which displays the day of the week in Japanese and English) there are now options for all English and all Japanese, each with an optional display of the digital time.

Thanks to the folks who wrote me with their ideas and requests!

data.description:
It's a flower that reaches full bloom at midday and folds back up by midnight.

It's a radial bar graph of the day.

It's an hour hand without a minute hand.

It's anti-aliased.  It has sub-pixels.

It's SunFlower.

Features:
 - Integrated hour/minute analog display with distinct AM/PM patterns.
 - Choice of English, Japanese, or the original mixed display of the date and weekday.
 - Optional display of digital time.
 - Battery charge level.
 - Bluetooth disconnect indication.

changelog.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

Language can now be changed.
Supported languages are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish and Italian.

Simple watchface that shows the hour, day of the week (in Dutch), day of the month, battery status and Bluetooth status.  The time and date are shown using a big font to keep it readable.
Battery status is shown with colored circles to also keep it readable.
Bluetooth status is shown using a colored Bluetooth icon.

Only supports Pebble Time watches.

Warning: Currently only tested on Pebble Time simulator.  As soon as I have my Pebble Time watch, it will be tested on a real watch.  If you have a Pebble Time watch, please let me know whether it works as expected or not.

data.description:
Simple watchface that shows the hour, day of the week (in English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish or Italian), day of the month, battery status and bluetooth status.
The time and date are shown using a big font to keep it readable.
Battery status is shown with colored circles to also keep it readable.
Bluetooth status is shown using a colored bluetooth icon.

Only supports Pebble Time watches.

pebble@telenet.be

latest_release.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

data.description:
Highly customizable weather watchface.

Day & Night allows you to see the current weather and forecasts for the next two hours via subtle icons. 

Customizable options include:
-Day & Night mode: Color scheme changes based on time of day.
-Top Display and Bottom Display: Logo, Location, Digital Time, Temperature, Long Date, Short Date, Sunrise, Sunset, BT status and Battery %, or Blank.
-Second Hand: Full second hand, "Edge" mode, or hidden.
-Set Temperature Unit and GPS-override location.

New in Latest Release:
-Cached data, so now weather loads immediately and updates if necessary.
-Timeline Pins! You can now choose in the configuration menu to include pins for sunrise and sunset.

latest_release.release_notes: Battery + BT display option

changelog.release_notes:
Design:
- New beautiful font Sugo
- Medium battery indicator by default

Functionality:
- Previous data shown when OpenWeatherMap gives no response
- Buzz feedback after settings update
- Additional improvements to configuration
- Hopefully, less crashes

Functionality: 
- Fix release for buggy CloudPebble build process
- Weather conditions languages (DE, ES, FR, SK) 
- Battery gauge colour white when charging 
- Battery gauge colour green when fully charged 

Design: 
- Updated icon with thicker battery gauge Implementation: 
- Weather conditions text improvements

Functionality / design: 
- Fix for Dropbox HTTPS
- Rest of day max / min forecast 
- No unit (C/F) displayed to accommodate max / min values

Design: 
- High contrast time configurable 
- Battery gauge thickness configurable 
- Battery gauge darker green for white scheme 

Implementation: 
- Fahrenheit temperature more precise

Implementation:
- More accurate Fahrenheit conversion

Design:
- Watchface is now configurable

Implementation:
- Configuration page:
-- Weather update interval
-- Weather display units
-- Date / time leading zero

Design:
- More contrasting colour schemes (on user request)
- Shorter high-contrast timeout (before light fades-out) 2900 ms
- Specific initial text when BT disconnected on watchface start
- Add version display on watchface start

Implementation:
- Weather refresh set back to every 15 minutes
- Changes to weather Pebble JS implementation 
- Additional locations in Slovakia abbreviated

Design:
- Flick wrist to trigger high-contrast mode
- New schemes for Pebble Time Black/Red/White
- Battery level gauge in red for Time Red

Implementation:
- Additional location strings trimmed

Implementation:
- Corrected white background colour for Time White

Design:
- Colour scheme according to Pebble make
- Battery gauge shows charge when Time reports sub-10% level
- Colour watchface icon

Implementation:
- Locations are now internationalised (Bruxelles -> Brussels)
- JavaScript location maximumAge zeroed

Design:
- Ready for colour schemes according the Pebble / Time make (coming very soon!)

Implementation:
- Changed weather refresh time to 5 minutes
- Weather refresh can fail 3x before reported

Design:
- Small adjustments to date/time position
- Battery bar uses "scale" background again on Basalt

Implementation:
- Location name abbreviation implemented
- Many location names in Slovak abbreviated
- Few location names in Dutch, French, English abbreviated

Design:
- Battery bar colours finalised

Design:
- Colours set back to basics

Design:
- Colourised for Pebble Time

Implementation: 
- Workaround for faulty JS in iOS Pebble Time application
- Additional strings removed from location names (i.e. "Arrondissement du ", etc.)

Design:
- Padding 'space' removed from date
- Verbose user notification for initial request

Implementation:
- Increased tolerance for connection warning
- Package size reduced

Design:
- Notification in case of communication problems
- Weather update not requested when BT disconnected

Implementation:
- Improved watch-phone communication tracking
- Developer notification text added
- Additional code improvements

Bluetooth:
- Vibrations on connect/disconnect

Implementation:
- Code improvements

Design
- Name changed to Frontpage
- Beautiful battery indicator

data.description:
*Configuration page is out of order. It's being worked on.*

Simple watchface with current weather. It's your personal news of NOW...

★ Rest of day max / min temperature ★
★ Celsius, Fahrenheit, leading zero ★
★ Colours match Pebble make ★
★ Subtle battery level indicator ★
❤︎ Give it a GO, give it a HEART! ❤︎

Main features: time (24h/12h), date (localised), battery level, location, current local weather (localised), bluetooth vibrate notification

Localisation date: English, German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español), French (Français)

Time format (leading zero configurable): 
H:mm/HH:mm (24h)
h:mm/hh:mm (12h)

Date format (leading zero configurable):
ddd d Mmm/ddd dd Mmm (all languages)
dd d. Mmm/dd dd. Mmm (German)

Weather (interval configurable):
Current weather and temperature
Rest of day temperature forecast
Refreshed every 60/30/15/10/5 minutes
Provided by OpenWeathermap.org

Localisation weather: English, German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español), French (Français), Slovak (Slovensky)

By design, date automatically displays in all languages that are officially supported by Pebble watch. (Currently: English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español)) 
If, in the future, a new official language is added to Pebble watch, date will display correctly in the new language (given the new language is set by the user in the Pebble app (Android or iOS)).

latest_release.release_notes:
Design:
- New beautiful font Sugo
- Medium battery indicator by default

Functionality:
- Previous data shown when OpenWeatherMap gives no response
- Buzz feedback after settings update
- Additional improvements to configuration
- Hopefully, less crashes

Choose from a selection of hair, eyes, noses and mouths to create your own pixel art style Tinyhead watchface. Digital time displayed on a flick of the wrist, or for those wanting an easier view of the time analog hands can be shown over the Tinyhead.

Love Tinyheads? Give it a heart!

data.description:
Crazy Eyes shows you the time in a unique way. The left eye represents the hour, the right eye the current minute. In the first screenshot it is 19:31 (7:31 pm). 

NEW: Background color configurable
NEW: Easter egg for Halloween.
NEW: Googly Eyes! Try it out by enabling it in the settings.
NEW: Nightstand mode when on charger (optional)

The eyebrows are configurable and encode the battery level of your pebble from 100% in the first screenshot to 10% in the second one. On a bluetooth disconnect, the eyebrows become narrower.

Optionally, the face can be completed with a mouth that shows the day of the month in binary.

Please support the further development of this watchface by purchasing it for 1.50 USD after a trial period of 48 hours. Payment will by handled by KiezelPay.If you donated to me in the past, shoot me a mail and I'll give you a 100% off!

data.author: Loic Verrall

changelog.release_notes: Battery Indicator (Bug Fix)

data.description:
Time is a simple, modern watch face based on the Simplicity watch face. Features include:
- Current weather (updated every 30 minutes). Please see my other watch faces for a Fahrenheit version.
- Day of the week.
- Date and Month of the year.
- A Seconds line which grows each second and wraps round at 60. It indicates how many seconds you are into each minute. E.g. if its half way filled, you're 30 seconds into the minute.
- Time (12h or 24h).
- A battery indicator at the bottom of the screen similar to that of the seconds line. A half filled bar represents 50% battery.

I hope you enjoy the watch face. If you have any comments/suggestions, feel free to email me: support@loicverrall.co.uk

latest_release.release_notes: Battery Indicator (Bug Fix)

data.description:
A watchface based off the Codec from Metal Gear Solid.

Instead of the frequency, the time is displayed. The bars on the left represent seconds (in increments of 10), "PTT" is your bluetooth connection, and a low battery warning is displayed when the battery is less than 20%. When it's charging, the bars turn into a battery gauge.

Compatible with both Aplite (Pebble/Pebble Steel) and Basalt (Pebble Time/Time Steel) platforms.

data.title: Volition

data.author: Simulation Curriculum Corp.

changelog.release_notes:
Added Pebble Time compatibility! See New Horizons in color!

Countdown timer will automatically start counting up once New Horizons makes the closest approach to Pluto.
The countdown timer is now properly adjusted for the local time zone.
Countdown timer to New Horizon's closest flyby of Pluto.

data.description:
Track the historic New Horizons mission on its journey to the distant world of Pluto and beyond!

From the makers of Pluto Safari app on iOS and Android comes a Watchface which counts down to New Horizons' closest approach of the (dwarf) planet and continues to measure the mission progress afterward.

latest_release.release_notes:
Added Pebble Time compatibility! See New Horizons in color!

Countdown timer will automatically start counting up once New Horizons makes the closest approach to Pluto.

data.title: New Horizons Countdown to Pluto

data.author: Simon Jackson

changelog.release_notes: using github.io -- gh-pages branch for settings.
altitude and velocity and bug fix decimal GPS
Mini icon change
fix atan pi/4

data.description:
Displays:

1. Location (also infers BT connectivity)
2. Reverse tan and exp gradients both div 10
3. Current X (charge+)Battery
4. Arc tan 1 @ 45 degree = 1 and gradient div 10
5. Log10 and gradient div 100
6. Time

There is also a Bluetooth disconnected vibration with a sensible 6 min time out to stop crazy vibes on edge of signal. The whole function space rotates every 6 mins.

latest_release.release_notes: using github.io -- gh-pages branch for settings.

data.description: This watch face really shines on Pebble Time. It displays time with small animation each minute. If there is no Bluetooth, it hides stripes (Pebble) or make them gray (Pebble Time).

latest_release.release_notes: Pebble 2 support

data.author: rhobits

changelog.release_notes: Fixed an issue where Battery Status would disappear after the watch face remains active for a period of time.

Fixed compatibility with Pebble Time watches

<==>

From last release:
Updated to SDK 3.0 – Users of FW2.9 and below, Modern Simplicity 1.0 will be the last supported version. 
- Temporarily removed vibrate on Disconnect and Connect as it was unstable on FW 3.8

Updated to SDK 3.0 – Users of FW2.9 and below, Modern Simplicity 1.0 will be the last supported version.
- Temporarily removed vibrate on Disconnect and Connect as it was unstable on FW 3.0
Initial Release to the Pebble Store

data.description:
A simple, opinionated, no nonsense watch face that includes everything you would want from a watch face. 

Features:
- Time takes centrefold for quick glances
- Bluetooth Disconnect also changes the watch face to be black text on white (see last screenshot)
- Battery level indicator
- Charging and Full Charge Indicator
- Weekday, Date
- Supports 24h Time

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed an issue where Battery Status would disappear after the watch face remains active for a period of time.

data.title: Modern Simplicity

data.author: Lignite

changelog.release_notes: -Fixed bluetooth disconnect alerts being blank
-Fixed the black borders sometimes being stuck as a setting. If you were affected by this, please go back into settings and update the "Old Style" setting to off.
-Added "old style" option for users who want a classic v1 look and feel
-Fixed a crash on load for some settings configurations

-Redesigned! No more black boarders, see even more colour on your screen :)
-Added support for Pebble Time Round
-Added new animations
-Added new settings
-Added live settings
-Added trial for new users (old users, you shouldn't see a trial unless you completely remove the app from your watch and then reinstall)
-A few bug fixes
-Removed a few old and ugly settings
-Removed support for black and white Pebbles (for some reason, we can't figure out how to make your screens have colour, sorry!)
Remove weather fetching

1.2:
-Update binary for SDK 3.0-beta10
-Remove InverterLayer. RIP in pepperoni :(
-Update version, and company name
Fix default settings not loading
Initial release :)

data.description:
Mosaic is a watchface that'll be sure to pop, slide and live with colour!

Utilizing every beautiful colour possible, Mosaic puts a wonderful, random array of colours across your Pebble. Along with plenty of animations and big numbers so you can always see the time.

---

This is a paid watchface. You will get the first 24 hours free.

latest_release.release_notes: -Fixed bluetooth disconnect alerts being blank

data.title: Mosaic
